title: Found a web game that is a blatant rip-off of League.

replies.body: Nice one dude, actually made me laugh. Get my upvote boi
I thought you were going to link the mobile game that's made by tencent (the people who own league) that is infact a total rip off.

Arena of Valor (Tencent's Mobile Game) was made after Tencent acquired Riot games. Tencent acquired a majority in Riot in 2011 (with part equity as early as 2008). In 2015 Riot sold the rest of itself to Tencent. Arena of Valor dropped in 2016, 8 years after Tencent started its acquisition of Riot Games.

"In 2015, Tencent approached Riot Games and asked them to turn their popular game League of Legends into a mobile title. However, Riot declined and claimed that League of Legends gameplay could not be replicated on smartphones. Tencent then proceeded to create their own mobile game."

Looks like Riot fucked themselves on that one, coulda had mad bank but they couldn't see past their own hubris.

On a side note, Arena of Valor is actually pretty fun~
